MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH15 and EH21 postcode areas of Edinburgh and Musselburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:59pm. Our team have established a damaged underground cable on Newcraighall Road, caused by a third party. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the complexity of the work required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:27pm on Friday, 6th November 2020
